entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
